title: Server response is 404 when deleting the client resource with Keycloak Admin Reactive Client

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

var clientsResource = keycloak.realm(command.getRealm()).clients();
        clientsResource.get(command.getClientId()).remove();

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

org.jboss.resteasy.reactive.ClientWebApplicationException: Received: 'Server response is: 404' when invoking: Rest Client method: 'org.keycloak.admin.client.resource.ClientResource#remove'
        

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

jdk 17+

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

20.0.3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.5+

### Additional information

_No response_
